# nexus-pie-chart



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property         | Attribute          | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                               | Type                                                                                                                                                                                                                 | Default         |
| ---------------- | ------------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------- |
| `canvasHeight`   | `canvas-height`    | Canvas Height                                                                                                                                                                                                             | `number`                                                                                                                                                                                                             | `undefined`     |
| `canvasWidth`    | `canvas-width`     | Canvas Width                                                                                                                                                                                                              | `number`                                                                                                                                                                                                             | `undefined`     |
| `chartData`      | --                 | Nexus pie chart props                                                                                                                                                                                                     | `NexusPieChartProps`                                                                                                                                                                                                 | `[]`            |
| `chartId`        | `chart-id`         | Chart unique Identifier                                                                                                                                                                                                   | `string`                                                                                                                                                                                                             | `''`            |
| `colorScheme`    | `color-scheme`     | Chart color scheme. Valid values are 'category10', 'accent', "paired", 'set1', 'set2', 'set3', 'black' and 'gray'.                                                                                                        | `"accent" \| "black" \| "category10" \| "gray" \| "paired" \| "set1" \| "set2" \| "set3"`                                                                                                                            | `'category10'`  |
| `innerRadius`    | `inner-radius`     | Chart inner radius.                                                                                                                                                                                                       | `number`                                                                                                                                                                                                             | `0`             |
| `inverse`        | `inverse`          | Invert background colors. Default value is 'false'                                                                                                                                                                        | `boolean`                                                                                                                                                                                                            | `false`         |
| `legend`         | `legend`           | Should display legend. Default value is 'true'.                                                                                                                                                                           | `boolean`                                                                                                                                                                                                            | `true`          |
| `legendFontSize` | `legend-font-size` | Set legend font size. Valid values are 10, 12, 14.                                                                                                                                                                        | `10 \| 12 \| 14`                                                                                                                                                                                                     | `undefined`     |
| `legendMetric`   | `legend-metric`    | Set legend metric string to key from your data set. For example: dataSet = [{ make: 'Volkswagen', model: 'ID4', year: '2020', }]  Then legendMetric = 'make'.                                                             | `string`                                                                                                                                                                                                             | `undefined`     |
| `legendWidth`    | `legend-width`     | Set legend width.                                                                                                                                                                                                         | `number`                                                                                                                                                                                                             | `undefined`     |
| `marginBottom`   | `margin-bottom`    | Canvas margin bottom offset. Default value is 0.                                                                                                                                                                          | `number`                                                                                                                                                                                                             | `0`             |
| `marginLeft`     | `margin-left`      | Canvas margin left offset. Default value is 0.                                                                                                                                                                            | `number`                                                                                                                                                                                                             | `0`             |
| `marginRight`    | `margin-right`     | Canvas margin right offset. Default value is 0.                                                                                                                                                                           | `number`                                                                                                                                                                                                             | `0`             |
| `marginTop`      | `margin-top`       | Canvas margin top offset. Default value is 0.                                                                                                                                                                             | `number`                                                                                                                                                                                                             | `0`             |
| `responsive`     | `responsive`       | Is graph responsive. Default value is 'true'.                                                                                                                                                                             | `boolean`                                                                                                                                                                                                            | `false`         |
| `stroke`         | `stroke`           | Pie chart edge color. Valid values are 'transparent', 'black', 'white' and 'gray'.                                                                                                                                        | `"black" \| "gray" \| "transparent" \| "white"`                                                                                                                                                                      | `'transparent'` |
| `strokeWidth`    | `stroke-width`     | Pie chart edge width. Valid values are 1, 2, 3 and 5.                                                                                                                                                                     | `1 \| 2 \| 5`                                                                                                                                                                                                        | `undefined`     |
| `tooltips`       | `tooltips`         | Should display tooltips. Default value is 'true'.                                                                                                                                                                         | `boolean`                                                                                                                                                                                                            | `true`          |
| `valueFormat`    | `value-format`     | Set value format. Valid values are 'USD', 'localestring', 'localestring1d', 'localestring2d', 'percent', 'percent1d', 'percent2d', 'YYYY', 'M/D/YYYY', 'M/D/YY', 'MM/DD/YYYY', 'MM YYYY', 'MMM D, YYYY', 'ISODATE', 'raw' | `"ISODATE" \| "M/D/YY" \| "M/D/YYYY" \| "MM YYYY" \| "MM/DD/YYYY" \| "MMM D, YYYY" \| "USD" \| "YYYY" \| "localestring" \| "localestring1d" \| "localestring2d" \| "percent" \| "percent1d" \| "percent2d" \| "raw"` | `undefined`     |
| `valueMetric`    | `value-metric`     | Set Value metric string to key from your data set. For example: dataSet = [{ make: 'Volkswagen', model: 'ID4', year: '2020', }]  Then valueMetric = 'make'.                                                               | `string`                                                                                                                                                                                                             | `undefined`     |


## Events

| Event                 | Description                                                | Type               |
| --------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------ |
| `nexusPieChartLoaded` | On load even on loading pie chart ('nexusPieChartLoaded'). | `CustomEvent<any>` |
